name: VISION A RURAL DEVELOPMENT SOCIETY
briefDescription: VISION was started in the year 1999 with a good ambition to uplift downtrodden and weaker sections of the society, with our efforts to bring them to a level and to  have good living and can join with mainstream of community who are enjoying all the amenities.  It is well known fact many people in remote areas are not aware of basic requirements of man which brings social status and keeps away the ignorance  to have better understandings with Education , Health & Hygiene,  Agriculture and it is also noticed that  Women are suppressed since centuries .  And they are not allowed to understand community  and to have better living.  The main factors which governs the society are 1)Ignorance  2). Poverty  3). Social conditions.
